posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. I am Jzd. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick Start 1Create a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

posts.title: 首页
posts.text: 简介 在读博士生，飞行器控制领域，专注视觉感知、强化学习与路径优化。PhD student in the field of aircraft control, focusing on visual perception, reinforcement learning, and path optimization. 技术博客GithubBlog HereCSDN 新闻2025-01-11 开通个人学术主页 出版物在写了在写了
